page.title: 18Kellam's Farm
page.content: { Kellam's Farm}is owned by{Bardon {Hill}Quarries.No one lives there any more,but there are two workers who live in Coalville_the man in charge is Mr.Graham Middlebrook.The farm itself is 454 acres in size,but the Quarry owns an estate of 1050 acres including forest land. The farm buildings are about 100 years old and built of stone.When the house was being repaired recently a {Stone Axe head}was found on a ledge above the door_the story says that it was there to frighten away the witches! This axe head may link with the{earthwork}(473132) which might be part of an{Iron Age Settlement.}Other people say it is an enclosure connected with the old{Mediaeval Deer {Park.} There are stables at the farm with eight horses,they also have eight cows that they keep as pets and quite
